definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)

sentences.english: Goshawk circled in the mountains on the river surging with the cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 蒼鷹在山巒上盤旋，江水隨着絕壁激盪。

sentences.english: The season with four soldiers jumped out of sheer precipice and overhanging rocks together.
sentences.chinese: 季連長帶着四名戰士攜手跳下懸崖絕壁。

sentences.english: They learned to rappel down a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 他們學會了繞繩從絕壁上滑下。

sentences.english: Here another rugged castle crowns the cliffs and crags.
sentences.chinese: 這裏又有一座高低不平的城堡建在懸崖絕壁之上。

sentences.english: The high place precipice like truncates, steep precipitous.
sentences.chinese: 高處絕壁如削，陡峭險峻。

sentences.english: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.chinese: 卡車沿着贊比西山谷的絕壁緩緩行進。

sentences.english: I think it's my favorite after Bluff Limbo.
sentences.chinese: 我想這是自《地獄邊緣的絕壁》後我最喜歡的作品了。

sentences.english: Cliff Palace is the largest cliff dwelling in Mesa Verde and also in North America.
sentences.chinese: 絕壁宮殿是梅沙而第和北美最大的懸崖窯洞。

sentences.english: Leading a small home on the censer under the provisional steep up a Precipice.
sentences.chinese: 龍頭上置有一小香爐，下臨陡峭的絕壁。

sentences.english: Wuyi mountain escarpment, pit giant valley.
sentences.chinese: 武夷山絕壁峭壁，深坑巨谷。

sentences.english: And Im standing on the edge of some crazy cliff.
sentences.chinese: 我會站在一道破絕壁邊上。

sentences.english: A rock overhangs out of the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 有一塊岩石懸垂在絕壁之上。

sentences.english: Rock dike inserted into quartz sandstone and was then weathered and denuded to form a precipice .
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩受岩脈穿插，岩脈被風化剝蝕後形成絕壁。

sentences.english: Enjoy the mysterious time at the "Blue Cave" located at cliff of Maeda cape.
sentences.chinese: 所謂青洞窟是指在真栄田岬絕壁上的洞窟。

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
